<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Texas">Texas</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=61" title="Edit section: Texas">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Utah">Utah</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=62" title="Edit section: Utah">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Vermont">Vermont</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=63" title="Edit section: Vermont">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Washington">Washington</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=65" title="Edit section: Washington">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<ul><li><img alt="Green tick" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/03/Green_check.svg/13px-Green_check.svg.png" decoding="async" width="13" height="13" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/03/Green_check.svg/20px-Green_check.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/03/Green_check.svg/26px-Green_check.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="600" /><span style="display:none">Y</span> <b><a href="/wiki/Nick_Rahall" title="Nick Rahall">Nick Rahall</a></b> (Democratic) 56.0%</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Spike_Maynard" title="Spike Maynard">Spike Maynard</a> (Republican) 44.0%</li></ul>
</div>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Wyoming">Wyoming</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=68" title="Edit section: Wyoming">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a href="/wiki/File:2010_House_Wyoming.svg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/2010_House_Wyoming.svg/220px-2010_House_Wyoming.svg.png" decoding="async" width="220" height="179" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/2010_House_Wyoming.svg/330px-2010_House_Wyoming.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/2010_House_Wyoming.svg/440px-2010_House_Wyoming.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1137" data-file-height="926" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:2010_House_Wyoming.svg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Wyoming's results</div></div></div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Non-voting_delegates">Non-voting delegates</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=69" title="Edit section: Non-voting delegates">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main articles: <a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_election_in_American_Samoa" title="2010 United States House of Representatives election in American Samoa">2010 United States House of Representatives election in American Samoa</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections_in_the_District_of_Columbia&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="2010 United States House of Representatives elections in the District of Columbia (page does not exist)">2010 United States House of Representatives elections in the District of Columbia</a>, <a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_election_in_Guam" title="2010 United States House of Representatives election in Guam">2010 United States House of Representatives election in Guam</a>, <a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_election_in_the_Northern_Mariana_Islands" title="2010 United States House of Representatives election in the Northern Mariana Islands">2010 United States House of Representatives election in the Northern Mariana Islands</a>, and <a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_election_in_the_United_States_Virgin_Islands" title="2010 United States House of Representatives election in the United States Virgin Islands">2010 United States House of Representatives election in the United States Virgin Islands</a></div>
<p>The House of Representatives includes five Delegates from the District of Columbia and outlying territories elected to two-year terms and one Resident Commissioner of Puerto Rico elected to a four-year term (for which the last election was held in 2008, so the seat was not up for reelection in 2010). These delegates are not allowed to vote on the floor of the House of Representatives.
</p>

<th><span data-sort-value="District of ColumbiaAL&#160;!"><a href="/wiki/District_of_Columbia%27s_at-large_congressional_district" title="District of Columbia&#39;s at-large congressional district">District of Columbia&#160;at-large</a></span>

<td><small style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Cleanup" title="Wikipedia:Cleanup"><span title="Wikipedia:Cleanup (February 2020)">data unknown/missing</span></a></i>&#93;</small>

<td><a href="/wiki/Eleanor_Holmes_Norton" title="Eleanor Holmes Norton">Eleanor Holmes Norton</a>

<td style="background-color:#B0CEFF">Democratic

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=70" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_elections" title="2010 United States elections">2010 United States elections</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_gubernatorial_elections" title="2010 United States gubernatorial elections">2010 United States gubernatorial elections</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/2010_United_States_Senate_elections" title="2010 United States Senate elections">2010 United States Senate elections</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/111th_United_States_Congress" title="111th United States Congress">111th United States Congress</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/112th_United_States_Congress" title="112th United States Congress">112th United States Congress</a></li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">Notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=edit&amp;section=71" title="Edit section: Notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">In addition, five of the six <a href="/wiki/Delegate_(United_States_Congress)" class="mw-redirect" title="Delegate (United States Congress)">non-voting delegates</a> in the U.S. House of Representatives were elected.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-7">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The nonvoting delegates represent the District of Columbia; the territories of American Samoa, Guam, and the Virgin Islands; and the commonwealths of the Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico, <i>see</i> <a href="/wiki/Title_48_of_the_United_States_Code" title="Title 48 of the United States Code">48&#160;U.S.C.</a>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.law.cornell.edu/uscode/text/48/16">§&#160;16</a>. They are all chosen biennially except for <a href="/wiki/Resident_Commissioner_of_Puerto_Rico" title="Resident Commissioner of Puerto Rico">Puerto Rico's delegate</a>, who is elected every four years, and next faced reelection in 2012.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

		<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li id="t-whatlinkshere"><a href="/wiki/Special:WhatLinksHere/2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections" title="List of all English Wikipedia pages containing links to this page [j]" accesskey="j">What links here</a></li><li id="t-recentchangeslinked"><a href="/wiki/Special:RecentChangesLinked/2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections" rel="nofollow" title="Recent changes in pages linked from this page [k]" accesskey="k">Related changes</a></li><li id="t-upload"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:File_Upload_Wizard" title="Upload files [u]" accesskey="u">Upload file</a></li><li id="t-specialpages"><a href="/wiki/Special:SpecialPages" title="A list of all special pages [q]" accesskey="q">Special pages</a></li><li id="t-permalink"><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;oldid=990869303" title="Permanent link to this revision of this page">Permanent link</a></li><li id="t-info"><a href="/w/index.php?title=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;action=info" title="More information about this page">Page information</a></li><li id="t-cite"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Special:CiteThisPage&amp;page=2010_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections&amp;id=990869303&amp;wpFormIdentifier=titleform" title="Information on how to cite this page">Cite this page</a></li><li id="t-wikibase"><a href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Special:EntityPage/Q1472632" title="Structured data on this page hosted by Wikidata [g]" accesskey="g">Wikidata item</a></li></ul>
